trip.title: Title
trip.sorry: We're sorry! This trip has been cancelled. The cancelation reason is shown below:
trip.optionalComments: Optionally, you can leave some comments for the manager

main.title2: Acme Explorer is here to help you!
main.title3: Find the trip that's right for you, sign up and get ready for one of the best experiences of your life!
main.staff1: We have the most professional staff to organize your trips
main.staff2: You can trust the entire team of professionals we have at Acme Explorer. With years of experience and a large number of clients, they will know your needs and know how to respond to them from the very first moment.
main.staff3: "I will do everything in my power to make your journey a unique moment! üå∏" - Isabelle, chief of staff.
main.adventures2: Discover new places, new activities, food you've never tried before, make new friends and much more
main.adventures3: "Catching sea bass has become my new passion üêü" - Villager, one of our explorers.
main.prices2: At Acme Explorer you will find the best prices for all destinations. Use our filters to find the most affordable trip on the date you prefer!
main.prices3: "I am once again asking you for your bells...üí∞" - Tom Nook, owner and founder.
